vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PrivateBank.cashOut (patch_6.sol#18-23):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender.call.value(_am)()) (patch_6.sol#20)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (patch_6.sol#21)
